verses.verse: וַיִּסַּ֤ע <WH5265> took his journey יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> And Israel וְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ל֔וֹ וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> with all that he had and came בְּאֵ֣רָה שָּׁ֑בַע <WH884> to Beersheba וַיִּזְבַּ֣ח <WH2076> and offered זְבָחִ֔ים <WH2077> sacrifices לֵאלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> unto the God אָבִ֥יו <WH1> of his father יִצְחָֽק׃ <WH3327> Isaac

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> spake אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> And God לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> unto Israel בְּמַרְאֹ֣ת <WH4759> in the visions הַלַּ֔יְלָה <WH3915> of the night וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said יַעֲקֹ֣ב ׀ <WH3290> Jacob יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> Jacob וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> And he said הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <WH2009> Here

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And he said אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I הָאֵ֖ל <WH410> I [am] God אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God אָבִ֑יךָ <WH1> of thy father אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָא֙ <WH3372> fear מֵרְדָ֣ה <WH3381> not to go down מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לְג֥וֹי <WH1471> nation גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of thee a great אֲשִֽׂימְךָ֥ <WH7760> for I will there make שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I אֵרֵ֤ד <WH3381> I will go down עִמְּךָ֙ <WH5973> you מִצְרַ֔יְמָה <WH4714> with thee into Egypt וְאָנֹכִ֖י <WH595> I אַֽעַלְךָ֣ <WH5927> and I will also surely גַם־ <WH1571> will also עָלֹ֑ה <WH5927> bring thee up וְיוֹסֵ֕ף <WH3130> [again] and Joseph יָשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> shall put יָד֖וֹ <WH3027> his hand עַל־ <WH5921> and עֵינֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5869> upon thine eyes

וַיָּ֥קָם <WH6965> rose up יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> And Jacob מִבְּאֵ֣ר שָׁ֑בַע <WH884> from Beersheba וַיִּשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> carried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> and the sons יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> Jacob אֲבִיהֶ֗ם <WH1> their father וְאֶת־ <WH853> טַפָּם֙ <WH2945> and their little ones וְאֶת־ <WH853> נְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH802> and their wives בָּעֲגָל֕וֹת <WH5699> in the wagons אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> had sent פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> which Pharaoh לָשֵׂ֥את <WH5375> to carry אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> And they took אֶת־ <WH853> מִקְנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH4735> their cattle וְאֶת־ <WH853> רְכוּשָׁם֙ <WH7399> and their goods אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which רָֽכְשׁוּ֙ <WH7408> which they had gotten בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and came מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all זַרְע֥וֹ <WH2233> and all his seed אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

בָּנָ֞יו <WH1121> His sons וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> and his sons' בָנָיו֙ <WH1121> sons אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for בְּנֹתָ֛יו <WH1323> with him his daughters וּבְנ֥וֹת <WH1323> daughters בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> and his sons' וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> and all his seed הֵבִ֥יא <WH935> brought he אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <WH4714> with him into Egypt ס

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> now these שְׁמ֧וֹת <WH8034> And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel הַבָּאִ֥ים <WH935> which came מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> Jacob וּבָנָ֑יו <WH1121> and his sons בְּכֹ֥ר <WH1060> firstborn יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> Jacob's רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> Reuben
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons רְאוּבֵ֑ן <WH7205> of Reuben חֲנ֥וֹךְ <WH2585> Hanoch וּפַלּ֖וּא <WH6396> and Phallu וְחֶצְר֥וֹן <WH2696> and Hezron וְכַרְמִֽי׃ <WH3756> and Carmi

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <WH8095> of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֧ל <WH3223> Jemuel וְיָמִ֛ין <WH3226> and Jamin וְאֹ֖הַד <WH161> and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <WH3199> and Jachin וְצֹ֑חַר <WH6714> and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> and Shaul בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽית׃ <WH3669> of a Canaanitish
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> of Levi גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <WH1648> Gershon קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> and Merari

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah עֵ֧ר <WH6147> Er וְאוֹנָ֛ן <WH209> and Onan וְשֵׁלָ֖ה <WH7956> and Shelah וָפֶ֣רֶץ <WH6557> and Pharez וָזָ֑רַח <WH2226> and Zerah וַיָּ֨מָת <WH4191> died עֵ֤ר <WH6147> but Er וְאוֹנָן֙ <WH209> and Onan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become בְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons פֶ֖רֶץ <WH6557> of Pharez חֶצְר֥וֹן <WH2696> were Hezron וְחָמֽוּל׃ <WH2538> and Hamul
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons יִשָׂשכָ֑ר <WH3485> of Issachar תּוֹלָ֥ע <WH8439> Tola וּפֻוָּ֖ה <WH6312> and Phuvah וְי֥וֹב <WH3102> and Job וְשִׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8110> and Shimron
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons זְבוּלֻ֑ן <WH2074> of Zebulun סֶ֥רֶד <WH5624> Sered וְאֵל֖וֹן <WH356> and Elon וְיַחְלְאֵֽל׃ <WH3177> and Jahleel

אֵ֣לֶּה ׀ <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [be] the sons לֵאָ֗ה <WH3812> of Leah אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whom יָֽלְדָ֤ה <WH3205> which she bare לְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> unto Jacob בְּפַדַּ֣ן אֲרָ֔ם <WH6307> in Padanaram וְאֵ֖ת <WH854> for דִּינָ֣ה <WH1783> Dinah בִתּ֑וֹ <WH1323> with his daughter כָּל־ <WH3605> all נֶ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> all the souls בָּנָ֛יו <WH1121> of his sons וּבְנוֹתָ֖יו <WH1323> and his daughters שְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <WH7970> [were] thirty וְשָׁלֹֽשׁ׃ <WH7969> and three

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons גָ֔ד <WH1410> of Gad צִפְי֥וֹן <WH6837> Ziphion וְחַגִּ֖י <WH2291> and Haggi שׁוּנִ֣י <WH7764> Shuni וְאֶצְבֹּ֑ן <WH675> and Ezbon עֵרִ֥י <WH6179> Eri וַֽאֲרוֹדִ֖י <WH722> and Arodi וְאַרְאֵלִֽי׃ <WH692> and Areli

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons אָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> of Asher יִמְנָ֧ה <WH3232> Jimnah וְיִשְׁוָ֛ה <WH3438> and Ishuah וְיִשְׁוִ֥י <WH3440> and Isui וּבְרִיעָ֖ה <WH1283> and Beriah וְשֶׂ֣רַח <WH8294> and Serah אֲחֹתָ֑ם <WH269> their sister וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the sons בְרִיעָ֔ה <WH1283> of Beriah חֶ֖בֶר <WH2268> Heber וּמַלְכִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH4439> and Malchiel

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [are] the sons זִלְפָּ֔ה <WH2153> of Zilpah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> whom Laban לְלֵאָ֣ה <WH3812> to Leah בִתּ֑וֹ <WH1323> his daughter וַתֵּ֤לֶד <WH3205> and these she bare אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> these לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> unto Jacob שֵׁ֥שׁ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֖ה <WH6240> teen נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <WH5315> souls
בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> The sons רָחֵל֙ <WH7354> of Rachel אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife יַעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> Jacob's יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <WH1144> and Benjamin

וַיִּוָּלֵ֣ד <WH3205> were born לְיוֹסֵף֮ <WH3130> And unto Joseph בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> whom יָֽלְדָה־ <WH3205> bare לּוֹ֙ אָֽסְנַ֔ת <WH621> which Asenath בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter פּ֥וֹטִי פֶ֖רַע <WH6319> of Potipherah כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest אֹ֑ן <WH204> of On אֶת־ <WH853> מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH4519> Manasseh וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶפְרָֽיִם׃ <WH669> and Ephraim

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons בִנְיָמִ֗ן <WH1144> of Benjamin בֶּ֤לַע <WH1106> [were] Belah וָבֶ֙כֶר֙ <WH1071> and Becher וְאַשְׁבֵּ֔ל <WH788> and Ashbel גֵּרָ֥א <WH1617> Gera וְנַעֲמָ֖ן <WH5283> and Naaman אֵחִ֣י <WH278> Ehi וָרֹ֑אשׁ <WH7220> and Rosh מֻפִּ֥ים <WH4649> Muppim וְחֻפִּ֖ים <WH2650> and Huppim וָאָֽרְדְּ׃ <WH714> and Ard

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [are] the sons רָחֵ֔ל <WH7354> of Rachel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who יֻלַּ֖ד <WH3205> which were born לְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> to Jacob כָּל־ <WH3605> all נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> all the souls אַרְבָּעָ֥ה <WH702> four עָשָֽׂר׃ <WH6240> teen
וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> And the sons דָ֖ן <WH1835> of Dan חֻשִֽׁים׃ <WH2366> Hushim
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> of Naphtali יַחְצְאֵ֥ל <WH3183> Jahzeel וְגוּנִ֖י <WH1476> and Guni וְיֵ֥צֶר <WH3337> and Jezer וְשִׁלֵּֽם׃ <WH8006> and Shillem

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> These [are] the sons בִלְהָ֔ה <WH1090> of Bilhah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> gave לָבָ֖ן <WH3837> which Laban לְרָחֵ֣ל <WH7354> unto Rachel בִּתּ֑וֹ <WH1323> his daughter וַתֵּ֧לֶד <WH3205> and she bare אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these לְיַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> these unto Jacob כָּל־ <WH3605> all נֶ֥פֶשׁ <WH5315> all the souls שִׁבְעָֽה׃ <WH7651> [were] seven

כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַ֠נֶּפֶשׁ <WH5315> All the souls הַבָּאָ֨ה <WH935> that came לְיַעֲקֹ֤ב <WH3290> with Jacob מִצְרַ֙יְמָה֙ <WH4714> into Egypt יֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> which came out יְרֵכ֔וֹ <WH3409> of his loins מִלְּבַ֖ד <WH905> including נְשֵׁ֣י <WH802> wives בְנֵי־ <WH1121> sons' יַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> besides Jacob's כָּל־ <WH3605> all נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> all the souls שִׁשִּׁ֥ים <WH8346> [were] threescore וָשֵֽׁשׁ׃ <WH8337> and six

וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> of Joseph אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יֻלַּד־ <WH3205> which were born ל֥וֹ בְמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> him in Egypt נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> souls שְׁנָ֑יִם <WH8147> [were] two כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַנֶּ֧פֶשׁ <WH5315> all the souls לְבֵֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יַעֲקֹ֛ב <WH3290> of Jacob הַבָּ֥אָה <WH935> which came מִצְרַ֖יְמָה <WH4714> into Egypt שִׁבְעִֽים׃ <WH7657> [were] threescore and ten פ

וְאֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֞ה <WH3063> Judah שָׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> And he sent לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before him אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> unto Joseph לְהוֹרֹ֥ת <WH3384> to direct לְפָנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face גֹּ֑שְׁנָה <WH1657> unto Goshen וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and they came אַ֥רְצָה <WH776> into the land גֹּֽשֶׁן׃ <WH1657> of Goshen

וַיֶּאְסֹ֤ר <WH631> made ready יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph מֶרְכַּבְתּ֔וֹ <WH4818> his chariot וַיַּ֛עַל <WH5927> and went up לִקְרַֽאת־ <WH7125> to meet יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> Israel אָבִ֖יו <WH1> his father גֹּ֑שְׁנָה <WH1657> to Goshen וַיֵּרָ֣א <WH7200> and presented אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> before וַיִּפֹּל֙ <WH5307> himself unto him and he fell עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוָּארָ֔יו <WH6677> on his neck וַיֵּ֥בְךְּ <WH1058> and wept עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוָּארָ֖יו <WH6677> on his neck עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> a good while

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> And Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> unto Joseph אָמ֣וּתָה <WH4191> let me die הַפָּ֑עַם <WH6471> Now אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> since רְאוֹתִ֣י <WH7200> I have seen אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> thy face כִּ֥י <WH3588> that עוֹדְךָ֖ <WH5750> because thou [art] yet חָֽי׃ <WH2416> alive

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵ֤ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to his אֶחָיו֙ <WH251> unto his brethren וְאֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִ֔יו <WH1> and unto his father's אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <WH5927> I will go up וְאַגִּ֣ידָה <WH5046> and shew לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> Pharaoh וְאֹֽמְרָ֣ה <WH559> and say אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> to him אַחַ֧י <WH251> unto him My brethren וּבֵית־ <WH1004> house אָבִ֛י <WH1> and my father's אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> which [were] in the land כְּנַ֖עַן <WH3667> of Canaan בָּ֥אוּ <WH935> are come אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> and to

וְהָאֲנָשִׁים֙ <WH582> And the men רֹ֣עֵי <WH7462> are shepherds צֹ֔אן <WH6629> their flocks כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> another מִקְנֶ֖ה <WH4735> for their trade hath been to feed cattle הָי֑וּ <WH1961> have been וְצֹאנָ֧ם <WH6629> their flocks וּבְקָרָ֛ם <WH1241> and their herds וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לָהֶ֖ם הֵבִֽיאוּ׃ <WH935> and they have brought

וְהָיָ֕ה <WH1961> become כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> shall call לָכֶ֖ם פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> And it shall come to pass when Pharaoh וְאָמַ֖ר <WH559> you and shall say מַה־ <WH4100> What מַּעֲשֵׂיכֶֽם׃ <WH4639> act

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֗ם <WH559> That ye shall say אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH582> trade מִקְנֶ֜ה <WH4735> hath been about cattle הָי֤וּ <WH1961> have been עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> Thy servants' מִנְּעוּרֵ֣ינוּ <WH5271> from our youth וְעַד־ <WH5704> until עַ֔תָּה <WH6258> now גַּם־ <WH1571> both אֲנַ֖חְנוּ <WH587> we גַּם־ <WH1571> both אֲבֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> even until now both we [and] also our fathers בַּעֲב֗וּר <WH5668> because of תֵּשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> that ye may dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land גֹּ֔שֶׁן <WH1657> of Goshen כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תוֹעֲבַ֥ת <WH8441> [is] an abomination מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4713> Egyptian כָּל־ <WH3605> every רֹ֥עֵה <WH7462> shepherd צֹֽאן׃ <WH6629> cattle
